revised_title: Observations on a Monstrous Head and its Anatomical Features
tldr: The author describes the dissection of a monstrous head, which had a single double eye in the center of its forehead. The head also had a unique depression and a double bag-like structure above the eye. The author discusses the possible developmental causes of these anomalies and the preservation methods used for studying such specimens.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
